Hakan Calhanoglu has an expiring contract at the end of the season with AC Milan. The club management is working to renew his deal in order to not lose a valuable player of Pioli’s system.

According to the information of tuttmercatoweb.com there seems to have been a rapprochement between the parties after the meeting which took place in recent weeks. The agreement could come for a salary figure of around €4.5 million per year.

Despite being followed by significant clubs, The Turkish attacking midfielder of the Rossoneri has given AC Milan priority and the summit scheduled for next week could be the decisive one.

replies.msg:
AC Milan management is trying to secure the signing of a midfielder to add to the squad list. It has been anticipated in our latest mercato news update by Vito Angelè that the club is working on the profile of Soualiho Meité from Torino.

Confirmations arrive from Gianluca Di Marzio that Milan is evaluating the type of midfielder they would sign. Contacts have been initiated with the entourage of the French 26 year-old midfielder to try to understand his availability. A new meeting is expected tomorrow: the request of Torino is a loan of 1 million and a buy-option set at €10 million.
